org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc

Class HedgedRpcChannel.BatchRpcCtx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.HedgedRpcChannel.BatchRpcCtx
  • Enclosing class:
    HedgedRpcChannel

    private static class HedgedRpcChannel.BatchRpcCtx
extends Object
    A shared RPC context between a batch of hedged RPCs. Tracks the state and helpers needed to synchronize on multiple RPCs to different end points fetching the result. All the methods are thread-safe.

        public void setResultIfNotSet(org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.protobuf.Message result,
                              HBaseRpcController rpcController)
        Sets the result only if it is not already set by another thread. Thread that successfully sets the result also count downs the latch.
        Parameters:
        result - Result to be set.

      • waitForResults

        public boolean waitForResults()
        Waits until the results are populated and calls the callback if the call is successful.
        Returns:
        true for successful rpc and false otherwise.
